question: Who has been elected the new President of International Boxing Association (AIBA)?
explanation: Gafur Rakhimov, an Uzbek businessman and sports administrator,  has been elected  as the new President of the International Boxing Association (AIBA), which is an amateur boxing\'s global governing body. AIBA is a sport organization that sanctions amateur (Olympic-style) boxing matches and awards world and subordinate championships. Its headquarters is located at Lausanne, Switzerland.
